title: [cmake] Make cudnn optional
body_html:
This is after discussion with @orionr and @soumith regarding dependency requirements for unified backend. This diff makes it so that we can determine the use of CUDNN at compilation time.

I did not have a chance to test it yet (mac cuda build hangs at the eigen error), so firing off a CI to test first.

@orionr do you know if we have BUILD_CAFFE2=ON and USE_CUDNN=OFF cases in CI?
